title: Will Riot bring back championship riven this year?

replies.body:
I think the point of them creating the "Championship Riven 2016" skin was to create a version of the skin that they can bring back with the other skins from the championship line.
But they will not be bringing back the original version of the skin _(with the crown and loading border)_

So I think it's a pretty safe bet that she will be returning this year in her 2016 updated form, _(but no guarantee, it is a touchy subject for some people)_.

But I'm sure they will bring it back :)
Thank you very much kind sir.{{champion:92}}
